data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Chenzhou to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chenzhou, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Chenzhou, Hunan, China.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Chenzhou, Hunan, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 467,152 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chenzhou, Hunan, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please remember the Biao Mien people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chenzhou, Hunan, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 38,348 believers in Chenzhou to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chenzhou, Hunan, China has a population of 505,500.

We estimate Chenzhou has 38,348 people who might know Jesus, 8,166 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 458,986 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Chenzhou, Hunan, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
